about_the_game:
Bailey is a rescue beagle who is thrilled to start a new life in Mighty Oaks Animal Sanctuary, but Mighty Oaks is crumbling. The current owner, Victoria, inherited the large parcel of land and its associated buildings from a distant relative. She is not rich by any means, but she looks to Mighty Oaks as a chance - her chance - to do good in the world for the variety of animals who call the sanctuary their home. 

Seeing their new owner struggling with the centre, Bailey decides to do anything they can to help and the more they do, the more the donations start to roll in. Across Summer, Autumn, Winter and Spring, Bailey finds various jobs to do, new areas to explore and different animals to help. 

But just as things start looking up, a stranger arrives, and trouble follows. Accidents, sabotage, and threats put Victoria and the animals in danger. Who is this stranger and what do they want? Can Bailey stop them before they destroy Mighty Oaks?

Features:

  • Experience the pure joy of being a pupper, let loose in the wild

  • Solve puzzles and help other critters with unique and sometimes silly problems

  • Mini-Open World

  • Run, Jump, Swim, Scramble, Sniff and Explore

Showcase your personality through the cosmetics system, with a plethora of clothing, footwear and jaunty hat options.

  • Dogs in ridiculous boots? Check!

  • Dogs in Top Hats? Sure!

  • What about Bow Ties? You betcha!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10310U (or better) / AMD Ryzen 5 2500U (or better)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1070 (or better) / AMD RX Vega 56 (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10500E (or better) / AMD Ryzen 3 5400U (or better)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX2060 (or better) / AMD RX Vega 64 (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

short_description: Happy-go-lucky dog helps save a local animal sanctuary, with help from furry (and not so furry) friends! Wag those tails and bound and bounce your way through this cozy adventure!
